title: Jordan Peterson & Jonathan Pageau Commentary #3 - Aion, Incarnation, Synchronicity - and Church!
description:
My last commentary in which I try to make sense of some Christian concepts, and to figure out, as so many of us are, why JBP is having a hard time allowing himself to be tossed.

PVK's vid re Incarnation: https://youtu.be/CghP3pwB5aE
My fave Pageau video (still): https://youtu.be/l9Ibs67ke6c
Good resources to understand Aion -
Uberboyo: https://youtu.be/yYpOPKpUHxc
Max Derrat: https://youtu.be/trdg53WonJo
